title: Willkommen zu accessibility first | Ãœber uns
p1: Accessibility First is a collection of insights, learnings, and experiences from industry professionals / leaders to spread awareness and help you erradicate invisible barriers.
p2: Breaking into accessibility can be overwhelming. It is a broad and always-evolving field. There is no simple checklist to make your products inclusive. Accessibility is about learning and developing empathy for life experiences different from your own. Developing empathy is our whole thing.
p3: Bridging the gap between designers, developers and testers by guiding them creating web content with accessibility in mind to make everyone aware of who actually is responsible for accessibility:
p4: Interdisciplinary teams, working together to make their respective corners of the World Wide Web a pleasant experience for all users.
p5: Accessibility is a team effort. Every role contributes a part to the puzzle to build a good user experience.
p6: Learn about what it means to create accessible design, how to avoid common mistakes and what to keep in mind when creating a design experience for everyone.
p7: There are so many accessible in-build features already called semantic HTML already. So why not learn about all of them and use them in the right way?
p8: There is much more than cross browser / device testing. Learn how to navigate a website using only the keyboard and how to get started with a screen reader.
